short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your productivity by monitoring website usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the fast-paced world we live in today, we often find ourselves busy all day without realizing where our time goes. This tool serves as a reminder of how you allocate your time, enabling you to dynamically adjust your work priorities. It is a simple and straightforward tool, designed for you to enjoy the benefits of efficient time management.
